title: SBF Trial – Forensic accountant reveals almost 70% of Alameda’s loans were serviced with FTX customer funds
description:
The eleventh day of the Sam Bankman-Fried (SBF) trial revolved around the testimony of accounting experts brought forward by the prosecution to shed light on the disappearance of $9 billion in FTX customer funds that preceded the cryptocurrency exchange’s bankruptcy. The main witnesses for the day were Professor Peter Easton, an esteemed accounting expert from […]

The post SBF Trial – Forensic accountant reveals almost 70% of Alameda’s loans were serviced with FTX customer funds appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Large Chainlink Holders Accumulate $38,500,000 in LINK in One Week While Retail Traders Take Profit: Santiment
description:
Crypto analytics firm Santiment finds that large wallets are gobbling up the native asset of the decentralized oracle network Chainlink (LINK). Santiment notes that addresses holding between 100,000 and 1 million LINK have accumulated $38.5 million worth of the crypto asset in the past week. The firm says those significant wallet moves are “more relevant […]

The post Large Chainlink Holders Accumulate $38,500,000 in LINK in One Week While Retail Traders Take Profit: Santiment appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
